page.title: 10N.R.L.M. HOLIDAY WEEK
page.content: Norfolk Rural Life Museum organises a week of holiday activities for children annually.The theme of the 1985 week is 'What did you do before the telly,Gran?' The programme is as follows:- 13th Aug.-{Toys and Games}-Hedgerow toys,Clay marbles,Zoetropes, Pompoms, Ragdolls,Peepshows,Board games etc. 14th Aug.-{Homemade Food} -Butter making, bread making,biscuit and butter moulds,hedgerow food and drinks 15th Aug.-{Victorian D.I.Y.}-Chair caning,marbling,wallpaper printing and hanging,scrap work,cottage furniture. 16th Aug.-{Sports and Pastimes}-Make and play fairground games, fishing rods,village sports. Every Day- A trip to the Farm to see the animals. Painting, collage and quizzes all week
